headline: Cloudflare Access: Now teams of any size can turn off their VPN
keywords: Cloudflare Access, Product News, VPN, Authentication, Security
description: Using a VPN is painful: Logging-in interrupts your workflow. You have to remember a separate set of credentials, which your administrator has to manage. If you are away from the office, the VPN slows you down. Beyond just inconvenience, a VPN can pose a real security risk.
